00037 #ifndef __LLOG_INTERNAL_H__
00038 #define __LLOG_INTERNAL_H__
00039 
00040 #include <lustre_log.h>
00041 
00042 struct llog_process_info {
00043         struct llog_handle *lpi_loghandle;
00044         llog_cb_t           lpi_cb;
00045         void               *lpi_cbdata;
00046         void               *lpi_catdata;
00047         int                 lpi_rc;
00048         struct completion       lpi_completion;
00049         const struct lu_env     *lpi_env;
00050 };
00051 
00052 struct llog_thread_info {
00053         struct lu_attr                   lgi_attr;
00054         struct lu_fid                    lgi_fid;
00055         struct dt_object_format          lgi_dof;
00056         struct lu_buf                    lgi_buf;
00057         loff_t                           lgi_off;
00058         struct llog_logid_rec            lgi_logid;
00059         struct dt_insert_rec             lgi_dt_rec;
00060         struct lu_seq_range              lgi_range;
00061         struct llog_cookie               lgi_cookie;
00062         char                             lgi_name[32];
00063 };
00064 
00065 extern struct lu_context_key llog_thread_key;
00066 
00067 static inline struct llog_thread_info *llog_info(const struct lu_env *env)
00068 {
00069         struct llog_thread_info *lgi;
00070 
00071         lgi = lu_context_key_get(&env->le_ctx, &llog_thread_key);
00072         LASSERT(lgi);
00073         return lgi;
00074 }
00075 
00076 static inline void
00077 lustre_build_llog_lvfs_oid(struct llog_logid *logid, __u64 ino, __u32 gen)
00078 {
00079         ostid_set_seq_llog(&logid->lgl_oi);
00080         ostid_set_id(&logid->lgl_oi, ino);
00081         logid->lgl_ogen = gen;
00082 }
00083 
00084 int llog_info_init(void);
00085 void llog_info_fini(void);
00086 
00087 void llog_handle_get(struct llog_handle *loghandle);
00088 void llog_handle_put(struct llog_handle *loghandle);
00089 int llog_cat_id2handle(const struct lu_env *env, struct llog_handle *cathandle,
00090                        struct llog_handle **res, struct llog_logid *logid);
00091 int class_config_dump_handler(const struct lu_env *env,
00092                               struct llog_handle *handle,
00093                               struct llog_rec_hdr *rec, void *data);
00094 int class_config_yaml_output(struct llog_rec_hdr *rec, char *buf, int size);
00095 int llog_process_or_fork(const struct lu_env *env,
00096                          struct llog_handle *loghandle,
00097                          llog_cb_t cb, void *data, void *catdata, bool fork);
00098 int llog_cat_cleanup(const struct lu_env *env, struct llog_handle *cathandle,
00099                      struct llog_handle *loghandle, int index);
00100 
00101 static inline struct llog_rec_hdr *llog_rec_hdr_next(struct llog_rec_hdr *rec)
00102 {
00103         return (struct llog_rec_hdr *)((char *)rec + rec->lrh_len);
00104 }
